The Defense Department guidance document made it clear that US military aims in regard to those states would go well beyond any ties to terrorism. The document said the Defense Department would also seek to isolate and weaken those states and to`` disrupt, damage or destroy their military capacities- not necessarily limited to weapons of mass destruction( WMD)...
